ai-patthana7.15:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_0: There is no desire for thoughts.
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_1: Or they don’t grow in full awareness.
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_2: There is no dependent on the teaching
ai-patthana7.15:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
